mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user (id, name, telephone, password, create_time, update_time, email, head_portrait, authority, run) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headPortrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{run,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_portrait = #{headPortrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, authority = #{authority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, run = #{run,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, telephone, password, create_time, update_time, email, head_portrait, authority, run from user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, name, telephone, password, create_time, update_time, email, head_portrait, authority, run from user
